attributes.action: that the eldelry and most vulnerable have the same law as children (to protect)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was watching Panorama and could not believe that a couple of years ago there was suppose to be a law to protect the elderly who lived in care homes that they would have the same rights and protection as children but the government let them down, these people need help and need people to look after them, everyone one day will be old and need proper care and not abuse if we do not let anyone abuse children why should we stand back and watch an elderly person get abused.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
